channel.title: Help me with donator rank please. REP++
channel.description: Hey there i need to add donator rank in my 637 source. Can somebody please guide me how i can do it? I just think that i dont got Donator rank in my server! Help ill rep!

item.title: Help me with donator rank please. REP++
item.dc:creator: @David321 David321
item.description:
@David321 wrote:

Oh sorry my english is bad.
But i cant add it shows errors all the time.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with donator rank please. REP++

item.title: Help me with donator rank please. REP++
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“David321, post:9, topic:432022”][quote author=halflive9 link=topic=534729.msg3909323#msg3909323 date=1328557151]

it means it is command. i got it and it says for ::yell command you need to be a donator.

I need to allow be players donators.
I mean i whana set like my admin rights , adding donator name in donor list
so i mean, that name what i added will be able to do command ::yell.

For your yell command you will have something like:
if(command…(“yell”) && playerRights == 1) {
change it into something like this. if(command…(“yell”) && playerRights == 1 || donator == 1) {
[/quote]

i just need a rights, they arent added, and i ask does somebody please can give me basic for my server, to add donator rights.[/quote]
That’s what i explained you with the variable. The variable donator will be your rights.

Read full topic

[/quote]
For your yell command you will have something like:
if(command…(“yell”) && playerRights == 1) {
change it into something like this. if(command…(“yell”) && playerRights == 1 || donator == 1) {[/quote]

item.title: Help me with donator rank please. REP++
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

A variable is for example,

public int donator;
In a 317 this is added in player.java as I don’t know anything about 508+ servers I can’t help you with the files. You can call the donator variable in for example your command handler.
for example:

if(donator == 1 && command.equalsIgnoreCase("donatorzone")){ c.toX = 3556; c.toY = 3442; c.sM("Welcome to the donator zone."); }

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with donator rank please. REP++

item.title: Help me with donator rank please. REP++
item.dc:creator: @David321 David321
item.description:
@David321 wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:4, topic:432022”][quote author=David321 link=topic=534729.msg3909271#msg3909271 date=1328548974]
in the playerdefinition it is added but in action sender it isnt.
and i dont know how i add it safe?
[/quote]
What you mean by adding it safe? It’s actually the same set-up like your moderator and administrator ranks but with a different variable.[/quote]

u mean variable is this?

if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("")) player.getDefinition().setRights(2);

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with donator rank please. REP++
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“David321, post:1, topic:432022”]Hey there i need to add donator rank in my 637 source.
Can somebody please guide me how i can do it?
I just think that i dont got Donator rank in my server!
Help
ill rep![/quote]

  1. Make a new variable called donator
    -if the variable donator is 1 the player is donator.

To add a symbol look it up in the client hacking section.
